thread.title: Ex-Australian cricketer Brett Lee elated by wife Lana’s pregnancy
thread.title_full: Ex-Australian cricketer Brett Lee elated by wife Lana’s pregnancy | DailyTelegraph

author: dailytelegraph.com
title: Ex-Australian cricketer Brett Lee elated by wife Lana’s pregnancy
text:
HOT on the heels of his former teammate Michael Clarke comes news that ex-Australian cricketer Brett Lee and his wife Lana are expecting their first child.
Lee, who already has an eight-year-old son with first wife Liz Kemp, is said to be elated by the news his partner of two years is pregnant.
The duo made a rare public appearance at the Australian premiere of Bollywood-style film UnIndian — which Lee stars in — on Wednesday night, with Lana attempting to hide her burgeoning baby bump with a flowy Christopher Esber dress.
The baby is thought to be due at the end of the summer.
Brett Lee. with his son Preston, when he was applauded from the field after his last game at the SCG. Picture. Phil Hillyard The couple tied the knot at the retired paceman’s Sydney home at Seaforth in 2014 after dating for one year.
He was previously married to podiatrist Kemp, who gave birth to their son Preston Charles in November 2006.
 The cricketer went on tour shortly after the birth of his son back in 2006, which ­reportedly put a strain on their relationship.
Let’s hope this time he doesn’t follow in the footsteps of Clarke and plan any risky sailing trips.
